channel.title: - EarthScape Forum Development - Moderator Positions Open! -
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img158.imageshack.us/img158/4471/ganstavy1xt5.png[/img] [size=15pt]E A R T H S C A P E[/size][/center]
Hello Everyone.
We Invite you to join our forums, Owned by I loot I, Ikick and Myself. [u]There are Moderator Positions open for [b]Active[/b] Members[/u]
At the Moment we have 86 Members. And 20 Really Good Tutorials, Mainly by I loot I Theres links to Download the EarthScape Server Which Includes Loads of Really Good Fetures. Like...
[ul][li]Full working auto-cast[/li] [li]Full working castle wars[/li] [li]Defence and attack bonus work![/li] [li]Mini games - Chompy Bird Hunting and Much more[/li] [li]Full ancients that freeze you[/li] [li]Pvp On/Off button![/li] [li]Almost every skill works[/li] [li]Slayer is trained on npcs[/li] [li]Construction[/li] [li]Elemental magics[/li] [li]Membership[/li] [li]Special attacks that hits[/li] [li]Cannon with cannon timer[/li] [li]Working skillcapes[/li] [li]Full pickpocking[/li] [li]You can train on npc attack strenght, range, hp and magic! (no longer on doors!)[/li] [li][u][b]And Much. Much More![/b][/u][/li][/ul]
[url=http://earthscape1.110mb.com/smf/index.php]So Join Today!!![/url]
